name: Exit the Board!
description:
EXIT THE BOARD! is a party board game from 2 to 4 players set in a fantastic world created by a carpenter and because of that all the elements in the game are wood crafted. 

Choose between a Goblin, an Orc, a Knight or a Wizard and fight your friends in the board, using the multiple special effects of the squares in the board and fighting in the different minigames in the end of each turn to decide who will exit the board!

EXIT THE BOARD! is a 3rd-year college project made by:

  • Programming:
    • Albert Abulí Federico
    • Víctor Sabaté Moreno (@SatTokifu)
  • Design:
    • Víctor Aguilera Moreno (@VicBoss98)
    • Claudia Martos Fito  (@keyday_16)
  • Art:
    • Pablo Muños Llana
    • Guillem Urpí Montserrat (@GuilleStrike)

Advice:

We recommend to play with game controllers of the same type.
